formable_nations_mod_category = {
	formable_nations_generic = {
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = ai_disabled 
			}
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = { 
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = TAG1
				original_tag = TAG2
				original_tag = TAG3
			}
			always = no
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 4 #90% rounded up, continents and other exceptions don't use this
						1 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						1 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						1 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						1 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_NEWTAG } } }
		}				
		icon = generic_form_nation
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_NEWTAG
			add_stability = 0.2
			set_capital = 1
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available
				1 = { add_core_of = ROOT 
				       transfer_state_to = ROOT }
			}
			1 = { add_core_of = ROOT 
				       transfer_state_to = ROOT }
		}
	}
	no_cosmetic_tag = {
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
		cost = 0
		visible = { 
			is_ai = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = hide_options_formable_nations }
			has_country_flag = unform_available
		}
		days_re_enable = 0
		
		icon = generic_decision
		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = unform_available }
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			add_stability = -0.2
			random_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital
				}
				clr_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital
				ROOT = { set_capital = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
	####################################################################
	formable_nations_africa = {#continent
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {		
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa }
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_on_continent = africa
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										state = 448
										state = 446
										state = 271
										state = 545
										state = 1107
										state = 1108
										state = 541
										state = 806
										state = 295
										state = 1070
										state = 459
										state = 558
									}
								}
								is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes
							}
							NOT = { is_on_continent = africa }
							state = 448
							state = 446
							state = 271
							state = 545
							state = 1107
							state = 1108
							state = 541
							state = 806
							state = 295
							state = 1070
							state = 459
							state = 558
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AFR } } }
		}
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						is_on_continent = africa
					}
				}
			}
		}				
		icon = formable_nations_africa
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			
			if = {
				limit = { tag = NFA }
				country_event = Nfarica.1
				set_cosmetic_tag = NFA_AFRICA
				1 = { remove_core_of = NFA }
				1= { transfer_state_to = SRD }
			}	
			else = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AFR	
			}					
			add_stability = 0.2
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available
				453 = { add_core_of = ROOT
				        transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						is_on_continent = africa
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
					transfer_state_to = ROOT
				}	
			}
		}
	}
	formable_nations_europe = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {			
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe }
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }	
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_on_continent = europe
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										state = 64
										state = 16
										state = 126
										state = 2
										state = 41
										state = 4
										state = 9
										state = 10
										state = 43
										state = 46
										state = 107
										state = 48
										state = 1024
										state = 37
										state = 6
										state = 1223
									}
								}
								is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes
							}
							NOT = { is_on_continent = europe }
							state = 64
							state = 16
							state = 126
							state = 2
							state = 41
							state = 4
							state = 9
							state = 10
							state = 43
							state = 46
							state = 107
							state = 48
							state = 1024
							state = 37
							state = 6
							state = 1223
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_EUR } } }
		}
		icon = formable_nations_europe
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			if = {
				limit = { tag = GER }
				set_cosmetic_tag = GER_europe2
				}	
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = AUS }
				set_cosmetic_tag = EUFL6
				}	
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = CZE }
				set_cosmetic_tag = EUFL2
				}	
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = SIC }
				set_cosmetic_tag = SIC_europa
				}
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = VNC }
				set_cosmetic_tag = EUFLV66
				}
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = FRA }
				set_cosmetic_tag = REDEU20
				}																						
			else = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_EUR
				}			
			add_stability = 0.2
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						is_on_continent = europe
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
					transfer_state_to = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	formable_nations_grossdeutschland = {
	
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_global_flag = ai_enable
			}
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = GER
				original_tag = AUS
				original_tag = GRU				
				original_tag = LUX
				original_tag = SWI
				original_tag = CZE
				original_tag = HOL
				original_tag = BAT
				original_tag = BAY
				original_tag = GEA
				original_tag = MAF
				original_tag = AFK
				has_cosmetic_tag = DKB_Leeb_Germany
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = germany_requirement_tooltip
							66 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							86 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							52 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }

							56 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }

							53 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }

							42 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							54 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							60 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							59 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							57 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							781 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							58 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }

							39 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }

							74 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							1138 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							69 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }

		highlight_states = {

				state = 66
				state = 86

		icon = formable_nations_grossdeutschland
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			if = {
				limit = { tag = GER }
				set_cosmetic_tag = GER_German_Greater
				}	
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = AUS }
				set_cosmetic_tag = AUS_GER
				}	
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = BAT }
				set_cosmetic_tag = BAT_germany
				}	
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = DKB }
				set_cosmetic_tag = DKB_Leeb_Germany
				}
			else_if = {
				limit = { tag = BAY }
				set_cosmetic_tag = BAY_DOLBUS_GERMANY
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { tag = GRU }
					set_cosmetic_tag = RSGDE5
				}																
			else = {
			    set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GDE
				}							
			add_ideas = GER_united_grossdeutschland
			add_stability = 0.2			
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available

				limit = { owns_state = 159 }
			    761 = { add_core_of = PREV
				       transfer_state_to = PREV }
					   }

				limit = { owns_state = 735 }

					   }

					   }

				limit = { owns_state = 34 }

					   remove_claim_by = ROOT }
					   }
			random_country = {
				limit = { owns_state = 785 }

	formable_nations_naziaryan = {
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_global_flag = ai_enable
			}
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			#NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				has_cosmetic_tag = RTGDE1	
				has_cosmetic_tag = RTGDE2
				has_cosmetic_tag = RTGDE3	
				has_cosmetic_tag = RTGDE4	
				has_cosmetic_tag = RTGDE5	
				has_cosmetic_tag = RTGDE6	
				has_cosmetic_tag = RTGDE7
				has_cosmetic_tag = RTGDE8

	formable_nations_patria_grande = {
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = { 
				original_tag = MEX
				original_tag = CUB
				original_tag = GUA
				original_tag = HON
				original_tag = ELS
				original_tag = NIC
				original_tag = COS
				original_tag = PAN

				original_tag = FOP
				original_tag = BRA
				has_global_flag = no_limit		
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
						277 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						313 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_global_flag = ai_enable
			}
		}

		visible = {
			always = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }

				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = FRA
				original_tag = NFA
			}
		}

			OR = {

	formable_nations_bulgarian_empire = {
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = BUL_YUG }
			NOT = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "加亚兹·伊沙基"
					ruling_only = yes
				}	
			 }		
			 NOT = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "库布拉特汗二世"
					ruling_only = yes
				}	
			 }				 
			 NOT = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Gajaz Ishaki"
					ruling_only = yes
				}	
			 }		
			 NOT = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Khan Kubrat II"
					ruling_only = yes
				}	
			 }					 		 
			OR = {
				original_tag = BUL
				has_global_flag = no_limit
			}
			#NOT = { has_global_flag = modern_country }
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					AND = {
						989 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }

	formable_nations_south_america = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_global_flag = ai_enable
			}
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america }
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_on_continent = south_america
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										state = 299
										state = 720
										state = 649
										state = 690
										state = 689
										state = 686
										state = 694
										state = 308
										state = 692
										state = 313
										state = 311
										state = 312
										state = 314
										state = 317
										state = 316
										state = 304
										state = 685
										state = 693
										state = 315
										state = 318
										state = 319
									}
								}
								is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
							}
							NOT = { is_on_continent = south_america }
							state = 299
							state = 720
							state = 649
							state = 690
							state = 689
							state = 686
							state = 694
							state = 308
							state = 692
							state = 313
							state = 311
							state = 312
							state = 314
							state = 317
							state = 316
							state = 304
							state = 685
							state = 693
							state = 315
							state = 318
							state = 319
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_SOU } } }
		}
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				is_on_continent = south_america
			}
		}		
		icon = formable_nations_south_america
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_SOU
			add_stability = 0.2
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_on_continent = south_america
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
					transfer_state_to = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	formable_nations_world = {
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0

			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }

					is_ai = no

				}

		}

				       transfer_state_to = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}

	formable_nations_hulaguulus = {
	
		ai_will_do = { base = 0 }		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0		
		visible = {
			is_debug = yes
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {				
				original_tag = UZB
				has_global_flag = no_limit				
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {

	}
	formable_nations_mughals = {
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = DEH
				original_tag = BHC			
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = modern_country }
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					AND = {
						321 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
					}
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = afghanistan_requirement_tooltip
							1219 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							445 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							1218 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							415 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							267 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							442 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
							1217 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
					}

	formable_nations_north_america = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america }
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_on_continent = north_america
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										state = 696
										state = 101
										state = 739
										state = 730
									}
								}
								is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
							}
							NOT = { is_on_continent = north_america }
							state = 696
							state = 101
							state = 739
							state = 730
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_NOA } } }
		}
		icon = formable_nations_north_america
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_NOA
			add_stability = 0.2
			set_capital = 358
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_on_continent = north_america
						NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
					transfer_state_to = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}

	formable_nations_alpine_federation = {
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = AUS_HRE }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = AUS_GER }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = AUS_AHE }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = BAY_GREATER_FRANKIA }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = BAY_DOLBUS_GERMANY }
			OR = { 
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = AUS
				original_tag = SWI
				original_tag = BAY
				has_cosmetic_tag = ALA_LIC
				has_cosmetic_tag = ALA_LIC_USA
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					AND = {
						4 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						152 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						153 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						39 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						942 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						1235 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						783 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						835 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						775 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						836 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						1137 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
					}
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = swiss_requirement_tooltip

	formable_nations_asia = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = MAG
				capital_scope = { OR = { is_on_continent = asia  is_on_continent = india  is_on_continent = middle_east } }
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								OR = { is_on_continent = asia  is_on_continent = india  is_on_continent = middle_east }
								NOT = {
									OR = {

											tooltip = yazhou_tooltip

											state = 526
										}										
									}
								}
								is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes
							}
							NOT = { OR = { is_on_continent = asia  is_on_continent = india  is_on_continent = middle_east } }
							custom_trigger_tooltip = {
								tooltip = yazhou2_tooltip
							state = 281

		}
		icon = formable_nations_asia
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }

	formable_nations_greater_korea = {
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				original_tag = KOR
				has_global_flag = no_limit
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					AND = {
						328 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						716 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
					}
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = korea_requirement_tooltip
						525 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						527 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						1347 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						1345 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						1346 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }					
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GGY } } }
		}
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 328
				state = 716
				state = 525
				state = 527
				state = 745
				state = 1347
				state = 1345
				state = 1346		
			}
		}		
		icon = formable_nations_greater_korea
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GGY
			add_ideas = the_spirit_of_goryeo
			add_stability = 0.2
			715 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
			885 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
			717 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
			408 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
			1246 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
			409 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available
				#korea
				525 = { add_core_of = ROOT 
				       transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				527 = { add_core_of = ROOT 
				       transfer_state_to = ROOT }

	formable_nations_middle_east = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east }
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					all_state = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_on_continent = middle_east
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										state = 229
										state = 230
										state = 231
										state = 164
									}
								}
								is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
							}
							NOT = { is_on_continent = middle_east }
							state = 229
							state = 230
							state = 231
							state = 164
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_MID } } }
		}
		icon = formable_nations_middle_east
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_MID
			add_stability = 0.2
			set_capital = 291
			753 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						is_on_continent = middle_east
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
					transfer_state_to = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}

								OR = { is_on_continent = north_america  is_on_continent = central_america  is_on_continent = south_america }

										state = 696

							state = 101
							state = 739

					}

	formable_nations_dadongya = {
	
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_global_flag = ai_enable
			}
		}
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = LEP
				original_tag = SQI

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_global_flag = ai_enable
			}
		}

			#NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }

				has_global_flag = no_limit

	formable_nations_himalaya = {
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = { 
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = BHU
				original_tag = NEP
				original_tag = SKM
			}
		}
		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					
					AND = {
						323 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						324 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
						888 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }			
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = SKM_HIMALAYA } } }
		}
		icon = formable_nations_himalaya
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_HLY
			add_stability = 0.2
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available
				323 = { add_core_of = ROOT 
				       transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				324 = { add_core_of = ROOT 
				       transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				888 = { add_core_of = ROOT 
				       transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				814 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				890 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				441 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				858 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				322 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				748 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				693 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1086 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				897 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				887 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}	
	formable_nations_hellenoturk = {
	
		ai_will_do = {

				add = 50

			}
		}

	formable_nations_firstlover = {
	
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
		
		cost = 0  days_re_enable = 0
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unform_available }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = hide_formable_nations }
			OR = { 
				has_global_flag = no_limit
				original_tag = IMJ
			}
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { is_subject = no has_global_flag = puppets_allowed }
					219 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
					608 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
					773 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes }
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = no
					has_global_flag = debug_mode
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = { tooltip = not_already_existing_tt NOT = { any_country = { has_cosmetic_tag = Nakayama_Naki } } }
		}		
		icon = Nakayama_Satsuki
		complete_effect = { capital_scope = { set_state_flag = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = Nakayama_Naki3 							
			add_stability = 0.2
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_land
			hidden_effect = { sound_effect = complete_focus  set_country_flag = unform_available				   	
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
						is_core_of = MON
